name: Blocky Builder
description:
Build the highest skyscraper in this attractive building constructor game and don't give a chance other players to grow higher than you!

Practice your reflexes and skills of stacking as the game becomes increasingly more difficult. Use slow motion for more accurate construction.

Challenge your friends and compete their challenges, set new records and climb to the top of the leaderboard.

Features:
- High-quality graphics;
- Addictive gameplay;
- Intuitive interface.
